story.text: Jan 3 Technical Olympic USA Inc. TOA.N said it named Stephen Wagman as its chief financial officer and executive vice-president, replacing Randy Kotler who has been interim CFO since June 2006. Wagman joins the homebuilder from MasTec Inc. (MTZ.N), a Miami-based infrastructure contractor, where he served as executive vice president, the company said in a statement. (Reporting by Manish Gupta in Bangalore)
story.title: technical olympic names cfo
